text: Cras-sur-Reyssouze is a former commune. It is found in the region Auvergne- Rhône-Alpes in the Ain department in the east of France. On 1 January 2019, it was merged into the new commune of Bresse Vallons.Arrêté préfectoral == References == Category:Former communes in Ain
title: Cras-sur-Reyssouze
